AUTH_FAILED: Sorry, your email or password is incorrect or the user does not exist. Please verify your data and retry.
COMMENTS_LENGTH_EXCEEDED_100: Comments length exceeded the limit of 100 characters.
CONFIRMATION_FAILED: The link is invalid, your recovery link may have expired.
ConcurrencyFailure: Concurrency failure. The resource has been modified by another user.
DefaultError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
DuplicateEmail: Email address already exists. Please use a different email.
DuplicateRoleName: Role name already exists. Please choose a different role name.
DuplicateUserName: Username already exists. Please choose a different username.
InvalidEmail: Invalid email address. Please provide a valid email.
InvalidRoleName: Invalid role name. Please provide a valid role name.
InvalidToken: Invalid token. Please check the provided token.
InvalidUserName: Invalid username. Please choose a different username.
LoginAlreadyAssociated: Login is already associated with another account.
PASSWORDS_NOT_MATCH: Passwords do not match. Please make sure the passwords match.
PasswordMismatch: Password mismatch. Please re-enter your password.
PasswordRequiresDigit: Password requires at least one digit.
PasswordRequiresLower: Password requires at least one lowercase letter.
PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric: Password requires at least one non-alphanumeric character.
PasswordRequiresUpper: Password requires at least one uppercase letter.
PasswordTooShort: Password is too short. It must be at least a specified length.
UNKNOWN: Unknown server error, please check your internet connection and try again
USER_IS_DEACTIVATED: Your access has been revoked. Please contact a system manager to resolve any issues. Reason: {{reason}}.
USER_IS_DELETED: Your access has been deleted. Please contact a system manager to resolve any issues. Reason: {{reason}}.
USER_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, your email or password is incorrect or the user does not exist. Please verify your data and retry.
USER_NOT_VERIFIED: User not verified. Please verify your account before proceeding.
UserAlreadyInRole: User is already in the specified role.
UserLockoutNotEnabled: User lockout is not enabled. Please contact support for assistance.
UserNotInRole: User is not in the specified role.
